titleStmt.title: W. A. Chesnut et al. to Thomas E. Bramlette
CWG5263

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.repository: Kentucky Department for Libraries and Archives
msIdentifier.collection: Office of the Governor, Thomas E. Bramlette: Governor's official correspondence file, petitions for pardons, remissions, and respites 1863-1867

body.p:
To His Excellency
Thos. E. Bramlett
Govr of Kentucky

We the Grand Jurors, at the last April term of the Todd Circuit Court found a bill for manslaughter agaisnt one J D Cumbee. This bill was pressed through by the influence of the Commonwealths Attorney (E. P. Campbell) during the absence of material witnesses for the defense we are now satisfied that the finding of said bill was Erroneous and feel it our duty to petition and pray your honor to pardon and release the said J. D Cumbee from all farther proceedings on said Indictment

W A Chesnut grand Juror
G. W. Hooser a Grand Juror
C A Bailey Juror
Wm T.. Lamb Juror
J J. Adams Grand Juror
A J Dowdy Forman grand Jury
A B Marion grand Jury
Benjamin Breis Grand Juror
Wm Perkins grand Juror
N. W. Stinnett grand juror
Joseph Russel G juror
